name: Rock Fall
description:
Dash away form those pesky falling rocks as you race to collect a shiny fortune!

Controlls

A or D to move. (arrow keys also work)

space to use a sweet dash ability!

Visit my website for more: https://www.vintrostudios.com/

Made from a tutorial. Art, audio, and some code is made by me. Please show support to the person who made the tutorial: https://www.blackthornprod.com/
